details:
GWhere allows to manage a database of your CDs and other removable media (hard
 disks, floppy drive, Zip drive, CD-ROM, etc...). With GWhere it's easy to
 browse your CDs or to make a quick search without needing to insert your CDs
 in the drive at each once.
 hardware::storage:floppy, implemented-in::c, interface::x11,
 role::program, uitoolkit::gtk, x11::application
